You Are Here: Home

Estancia Del Sol

Corona Senior Living

Welcome to world-class service. Welcome to comfortable, elegant surroundings. Welcome to what senior living is meant to be in Corona, CA – WESTliving style.

Looking for a welcoming senior living community with exceptional service in sunny, southern California?  You’re right where you belong: Estancia Del Sol in Corona, California.

Here at Estancia Del Sol, we’re dedicated to offering a true sense of belonging to seniors and their families. It’s a feeling you’ll notice the moment you’re invited to “make yourself at home” and continues through every thoughtful, personal detail.

As part of the WESTliving family, we understand the importance of world-class service. In fact, we even have a name for it: WESTclass service.  We hire carefully and train extensively.  The result?  Team Members who are empowered to make a meaningful difference in the lives of those we serve.  Team Members inspired to anticipate your want and desire even before you may realize it!

From independent living, assisted living, and memory care, the WESTliving experience creates and encourages a sense of belonging.  Our culture of hospitality in senior living also promotes privacy, dignity and a sense of empowerment.  A variety of activities including gardening, art classes, local tours and tai chi await here at Estancia Del Sol.  Just a quick drive from Los Angeles and the Cleveland National Forest.

Come see for yourself how the newest Corona senior living community can become your warm, welcoming place to call home. We’d love to show you around and allow you to experience for yourself a true sense of belonging!  We are here to serve!
